% A LaTeX template for submissions to Mathematical Models and Methods in Applied Sciences.
% Derived from ws-m3as.tex.
<<MinimumVersion: 1.0.0>>
<<% >>
<<TemplateDescription: Mathematical Models and Methods in Applied Sciences>>
<<% >>
<<Dependency: ws-m3as.cls>>
<<Dependency: ws-m3as.bst>>
<<Dependency: postpreamble-m3as.sty>>
<<% >>
<<CreateCustomBibliography: --arxivtotypeornote --doitonote --haltotypeornote --onlinetotechreport --urltonote --urntonote>>

% Prepreamble follows.
<<LaTeXPrePreamble>>

% Load the documentclass.
\documentclass[<<DocumentClassOptions>>]{ws-m3as}

% Preamble follows.
<<LaTeXPreamble>>

% Setup document metadata.
\makeatletter
\@ifpackageloaded{hyperref}{%
	\hypersetup{
		pdftitle = {<<Title>>},
		pdfauthor = {<<AuthorsFullNamesCommaSeparated>>},
		pdfkeywords = {<<KeywordsCommaSeparated>>},
		pdfcreator = {<<ScoopTemplateEngineSignature>>}
	}
}{
	\pdfinfo{
		/Title (<<Title>>)
		/Author (<<AuthorsFullNamesCommaSeparated>>)
		/Subject ()
		/Keywords (<<KeywordsCommaSeparated>>)
		/Creator (<<ScoopTemplateEngineSignature>>)
	}
}
\makeatother

\begin{document}

% Set running headers as well as PDF title and authors.
\markboth{<<AuthorsRunningHeadWorldScientific>>}{<<ShortTitle>>}
\catchline{}{}{}{}{}

% Set title and subtitle information.
\title{<<TitleNewlineSubTitle>><<DedicationFootnote>>}

% Set author information.
<<AuthorsInstitutionsWorldScientific>>

\maketitle

% Set submission history.
\begin{history}
\received{(Day Month Year)}
\revised{(Day Month Year)}
\accepted{(Day Month Year)}
\comby{(xxxxxxxxxx)}
\end{history}

% Insert the abstract.
<<CommentIfAbstractEmpty>>\begin{abstract}
<<InputAbstract>>
<<CommentIfAbstractEmpty>>\end{abstract}

% Insert the keywords.
<<CommentIfKeywordsEmpty>>\keywords{<<KeywordsSemicolonSeparated>>}

% Insert the Mathematics Subject Classification.
<<CommentIfMSCCodesEmpty>>\ccode{AMS Subject Classification: <<MSC>>}

% Insert the document body.
<<InputBody>>

% Insert the funding information.
<<FundingSectionStarred>>

% Insert the appendix.
\appendix
<<InputAppendix>>

% Insert the bibliography.
\bibliographystyle{ws-m3as}
<<CustomBibliography>>

\end{document}
